TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback(context As HttpContext) As String
type HttpResponseSubstitutionCallback = delegate of HttpContext -> string

param.name: context
param.span: ，包含網頁的 HTTP 要求資訊，該網頁具有需要快取後替代作業的控制項。

span.span: The that contains the HTTP request information for the page with the control that requires post-cache substitution.

summary.span: 表示處理快取後替代作業之方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles post-cache substitution.

returns.span: 傳送至用戶端之前，插入快取回應的內容。

span.span: The content inserted into the cached response before being sent to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派，結合方法，用於快取後內容的呈現和控制項。The delegate, in combination with the method, is used for rendering post-cache content for the and controls. 針對控制，請使用屬性來指定時所叫用的回呼方法的名稱控制項執行。For the control, use the property to specify the name of the callback method to invoke when the control executes. 您指定的回呼方法必須在頁面上，或包含使用者控制項上的靜態方法控制項。The callback method that you specify must be a static method on the page or on the user control that contains the control. 回呼方法的簽章必須符合的簽章委派，會取得參數並傳回的字串。The signature for the callback method must match the signature for an delegate that takes an parameter and returns a string. 針對控制項，轉譯是獨立的頁面快取供事件處理常式，除非事件。For the control, rendering is independent of the page caching unless an event handler is provided for the event. 如果沒有事件處理常式存在，快取後替代作業用來呈現內容。If no event handler is present, post-cache substitution is used to render the content. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何新增以程式設計方式來輸出快取的網頁上的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to add a control programmatically to an output-cached Web page. 當頁面載入目前的日期和時間會顯示在標籤中的使用者。When the page loads, the current date and time are displayed to the user in a label. 本節中的頁面快取，並每隔 60 秒更新一次。This section of the page is cached and updated every 60 seconds. 當控制項執行時，它會呼叫`GetCurrentDateTime`方法，它必須符合的簽章委派。When the control executes, it calls the `GetCurrentDateTime` method, which must match the signature for the delegate. 所傳回的字串`GetCurrentDateTime`方法顯示給使用者。The string that is returned by the `GetCurrentDateTime` method is displayed to the user. 本節中的頁面不會快取，並每次重新整理頁面時都會更新。This section of the page is not cached and is updated each time the page is refreshed. 屬性控制項取得或設定回呼方法的名稱。The property of the control gets or sets the name of the callback method. [!code-aspx-csharp[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/CS/substitutioncstrcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[SubstitutionCstr#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SubstitutionCstr/VB/substitutioncstrvb.aspx#1)]
